MutationRecord.summary: The MutationRecord is a read-only interface that represents an individual DOM mutation observed by a . It is the object inside the array passed to the callback of a .

MutationRecordAddedNodes.summary: The read-only property addedNodes is a of nodes added to a target node by a mutation observed with a .
MutationRecordAddedNodes.value: A containing the nodes added to the target of the mutation observed by the .

MutationRecordAttributeName.summary: The read-only property attributeName contains the name of a changed attribute belonging to a node that is observed by a .
MutationRecordAttributeName.value: If the record's type is attributes, this is a string representing the name of the mutated attribute of the mutation target.If the record's type is not attributes, this is null.

MutationRecordAttributeNamespace.summary: The read-only property attributeNamespace is the namespace of the mutated attribute in the observed by a .
MutationRecordAttributeNamespace.value: If the record's type is attributes, the property is a string representing the namespace of the mutated attribute of the mutation target. The value is null otherwise.

MutationRecordNextSibling.summary: The read-only property nextSibling is the next sibling of an added or removed child node of the target of a .
MutationRecordNextSibling.value: If a node is added to or removed from the target of a , the value is the that is the next sibling of the added or removed node: that is, the node immediately following this one in the parent's list.The value is null if there are no added or removed nodes, or if the node is the last child of its parent.

MutationRecordOldValue.summary: The read-only property oldValue contains the character data or attribute value of an observed node before it was changed.
MutationRecordOldValue.value: A string representing the old value of an attribute which has been changed, if:A string representing the old value of a node that has been changed, if:Otherwise this property is null.

MutationRecordPreviousSibling.summary: The read-only property previousSibling is the previous sibling of an added or removed child node of the target of a .
MutationRecordPreviousSibling.value: If a node is added to or removed from the target of a , the value is the that is the previous sibling of the added or removed node: that is, the node immediately before this one in the parent's list.The value is null if there are no added or removed nodes, or if the node is the first child of its parent.

MutationRecordRemovedNodes.summary: The read-only property removedNodes is a of nodes removed from a target node by a mutation observed with a .
MutationRecordRemovedNodes.value: A containing the nodes removed from the target of the mutation observed by the .

MutationRecordTarget.summary: The read-only property target is the target (i.e., the mutated/changed node) of a mutation observed with a .

MutationRecordType.summary: The read-only property type is the type of the observed by a .
MutationRecordType.value: The property is set to the type of the mutation as a string. The value can be one of the following:
